byline.original: By DALE CARNEGIE and ASSOCIATES, with BRENT COLE

snippet: “In 1936, Dale Carnegie made a compelling statement to his readers: ‘Dealing with people is probably the biggest problem you face.’”
lead_paragraph: “In 1936, Dale Carnegie made a compelling statement to his readers: ‘Dealing with people is probably the biggest problem you face.’”

headline.main: ‘How to Win Friends and Influence People in the Digital Age’
